item.description:
Hi Everyone,

The weather PREDICTION is looking pretty good so far:

Mostly sunny, with a high near 46. North wind around 9 mph.

You will be pedaling and will get warm but still you will feel some wind chill at times so wear something that resists wind and something that keeps your ears, hands, and feet warm.

al-r

-----------------------------

It's almost Spring.  Let's get outside and enjoy the countryside pre kayak season.

Exercise, Friendship and Lunch.  What could be better?

Directions to WADSWORTH --

APX GPS to get you close enough: 809 Wadsworth ST, Middletown CT

Al-r will be wearing an Orange Hunting Vest to make it easier to find us if necessary.

From Hartford area:

Take I-91 south onto Route 9 south. Follow Route 9 south to Middletown. Take Middletown – Meriden Exit 15 onto Route 66. Stay on Route 66 through Middletown for 6-7 traffic lights – look for the signs Wadsworth Falls State Park and Route 157 at a traffic light near a Walgreen’s Pharmacy. Take a left onto Route 157. Stay on Route 157. Wadsworth Falls State Park will be on the left.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Itinerary:

1. Part easy mountain bike trail (two waterfalls loop)

2. Part easy road riding through country roads

3. Lunch at Lyman Orchards

4. Visit Wadsworth Mansion and trail system

5. Return to Wadsworth Street where the cars are parked

(Bike Helmets required)

Estimated Distance: 11-12 miles

Estimated Time: about 2.0 hours

Estimated Time with Lunch: about 3.0 hours

Don’t hold me to exact time or exact distance—these are approximations.

Here is the route:

1. Park and meet: Wadsworth Falls state park, Park entrance on Wadsworth Street.

2. We will follow #1 trail on this map [1.5 miles] (right click here, open in html hyperlink: http://www.bikekinetix.com/t_ct/ct_state/wadsworth_map.html

3. We will come out on Cherry Hill Road where we will continue to Miller Road to Lyman Road. [2.0 miles]

4. Lunch at Lyman Orchard on the veranda overlooking the duck pond.

5. Return, north on Lyman Road à Route 147

6. Onto Miller Road

7. Onto Cherry Hill Road

8. Back into Wadsworth park system

9. Follow trail #1 to Trail #4 to Trail #2 to CARS.

10. Continue past cars to Wadsworth mansion at Long Hill estate and follow brick wall path leading around the grounds [8 miles from Lyman orchard]

11. Head back to Wadsworth Street back to cars [ 0.5 mile]

What to bring:

A bicycle, helmet, water bottle, backpack, closed toe shoes.

About $10 for lunch (can be less or more, depends on what you like to order).

Disclaimer: By RSVPing to this meetup, I understand that I am responsible for myself, my own belongings, my health and well being.  I will not hold meetup or any of its organizers responsible financially or personally in any way.  I understand that all activities involve some risk and will not hold meetup or any organizers responsible for any health or financial risk occuring to me or to my possessions.
item.how_to_find_us: Wadsworth Falls State Park, Wadsworth Street, Middletown CT

group.who: River and Shore Kayak-r's of CT

item.name: Easy Bicycle Journey- Part Trail and Part Road @ Wadsworth Falls & Lyman Orchard
